name: Potato (Leafy Plush)
description:
Random game I made.

Try to go to the golden potato, jump on evil potatoes to kill them, don't run into them. Also don't touch red.

Move using the arrow keys. You can double jump by pressing the up arrow twice.

Meatball Parade by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4993-meatball-parade

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
